title: Robert Louis Stevenson
author: Black, Margaret Moyes
snippet: When he heard that his aunt was going to see a relative in Saxe CoburgPlace, he begged to be allowed to go with her, and, the permissiongranted, started off in great pride on his very first expedition withouthis nurse, that faithful friend of the Stevenson family having promisedto follow later to take him home. The aunt at least had cause toremember that walk!
